item.title: Massimiliano Furlan
item.description: Email: massimiliano[dot]furlan[at]warwick.ac.uk GitHub: https://github.com/massimilianofurlan About Me MRes in Economics at the University of Warwick Research Interest Game theory and learning algorithms %## A Nice Equation % $$ %$$ % v_\pi(s_t) = \max_{a_t \in A(s_t)} \! \big\{ E_F\! \left[r_{t} + \delta v_\pi \! \left(s_{t+1}\right)| s_t,a_t\right] \big\}, \quad r_t, s_{t+1} \sim F(r_t,s_{t+1}| s_t,a_t) %$$ %$$
